channel.title: Prosperity - Back to the good old days
channel.description:
[center][B]This server is under new ownership so i have re-posted it so I can modify the thread[/B][/center]
[CENTER][IMG]http://prosperity-pk.com/images/pros11.gif[/img]
[B]Many of us want to go back to the old runescape we loved, prosperity gives you the chance to go back and relive those memories in a fun way :) Every skill works, every boss works, combat is perfect, and everything is fun with the medium set Exp rates. That means you don't have to no life to be successful and have fun.[/B]
[B][U]Most recent updates[/U][/B]:
[ul][*]Your private messages will now be logged. [*]A chat filter has now been added to the game to stop advertising and offensive language. Please don't try to avoid the filters or you may end up getting muted! [*]You will now not be able to use arrows with a karils crossbow, only bolt racks. [*]You now cannot use bolt racks with a dark bow. [*]Karils crossbow and rune crossbow should now have less delayed hits. [*]Whip special now uses a formula that considders melee defense and melee attack to generate a random chance of hitting. [*]Ardy should now not show a wilderness sign. [*]Another un-named bug has been fixed. [*]Melee defence slightly improved [*]Castle wars has been improved to an extent where it should be playable for now. more updates will come to it later.[/ul]
[center]Media [img]http://img838.imageshack.us/img838/9223/cookw.png[/img] [img]http://img232.imageshack.us/img232/835/firemakingl.png[/img] [img]http://img850.imageshack.us/img850/4998/woodcuttingl.png[/img] [img]http://img502.imageshack.us/img502/7366/farminga.png[/img] [img]http://img13.imageshack.us/img13/6870/runecraftingr.png[/img] [img]http://img72.imageshack.us/img72/7159/agilityt.png[/img] [img]http://img192.imageshack.us/img192/9057/herblorey.png[/img] [img]http://img804.imageshack.us/img804/8157/thievingp.png[/img] [img]http://img37.imageshack.us/img37/5313/craftingr.png[/img] [img]http://img688.imageshack.us/img688/1204/fletchu.png[/img] [img]http://img854.imageshack.us/img854/8678/miningr.png[/img] [img]http://img37.imageshack.us/img37/7879/smithingo.png[/img] [img]http://img19.imageshack.us/img19/1810/smith2.png[/img] [img]http://img571.imageshack.us/img571/492/fishl.png[/img][/center] [img]http://i123.photobucket.com/albums/o305/in4ad8/images4.png[/img] [img]http://i123.photobucket.com/albums/o305/in4ad8/images.png[/img] [img]http://i123.photobucket.com/albums/o305/in4ad8/images3-2.jpg[/img] [img]http://i123.photobucket.com/albums/o305/in4ad8/trails4.jpg[/img] [img]http://i123.photobucket.com/albums/o305/in4ad8/images1.png[/img] [img]http://i123.photobucket.com/albums/o305/in4ad8/KBD.jpg[/img] [img]http://i123.photobucket.com/albums/o305/in4ad8/zerkerringg.jpg[/img] [img]http://i123.photobucket.com/albums/o305/in4ad8/barrows.jpg[/img][/center]
[CENTER][B][B]I urge you to visit us![/B][/B] [url=http://www.prosperity-pk.com]Prosperity - Go back to the good times..[/url][/CENTER]

item.title: Prosperity - Back to the good old days
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

The bar above the webclient is ugly as fuck. Don’t use your own custom little font and your half-assed logo.

Read full topic

item.title: Prosperity - Back to the good old days
item.dc:creator: @callmedragon callmedragon
item.description:
@callmedragon wrote:

[center]This server is under new ownership so i have re-posted it so I can modify the thread[/center]

[CENTER]

Many of us want to go back to the old runescape we loved,
prosperity gives you the chance to go back and relive those memories in a fun way
Every skill works, every boss works, combat is perfect, and everything is fun with the medium set Exp rates.
That means you don’t have to no life to be successful and have fun.

Most recent updates:

[ul][]Your private messages will now be logged.
[]A chat filter has now been added to the game to stop advertising and offensive language. Please don’t try to avoid the filters or you may end up getting muted!
[]You will now not be able to use arrows with a karils crossbow, only bolt racks.
[]You now cannot use bolt racks with a dark bow.
[]Karils crossbow and rune crossbow should now have less delayed hits.
[]Whip special now uses a formula that considders melee defense and melee attack to generate a random chance of hitting.
[]Ardy should now not show a wilderness sign.
[]Another un-named bug has been fixed.
[]Melee defence slightly improved
[]Castle wars has been improved to an extent where it should be playable for now. more updates will come to it later.[/ul]

[center]Media













[/center]

images4.png763×528

images.png771×536



images1.png755×492


zerkerringg.jpg766×531

[/center]

[CENTER]I urge you to visit us! Prosperity - Go back to the good times…[/CENTER]

Read full topic
item.source: Prosperity - Back to the good old days
